name: Grupo Axe Capoeira - St. Croix

locations.name: University of The Virgin Islands
locations.schedule: every Friday at 6 pm [usually 6-7, sometimes 7:30 or later]
locations.rawText:
at The University of The Virgin Islands [St. Croix Campus]
For more information call [340] 773-2868,
e-mail Menino [meninod@hotmail.com]

notes: St. Croix, Virgin Islands. Taught by Menino. Instructor: Ishaq Abdul-Kabir. There is a capoeira group that meets at the gym at University of the Virgin Islands every Friday at 6 pm. With a fellow Capoeirista from Grupo Axe Capoeira, Sonia helped grow Capoeira in the Virgin Islands. The group in St. Croix celebrated their success by hosting a Batizado, bringing Mestre Barrao and other guests to meet the students of the United States Virgin Islands. SOURCE: dead website 2003, reddit, capoeiakc.com 11/24/16
rawRecord:
Grupo Axe Capoeira
Taught by Menino
at The University of The Virgin Islands [St. Croix Campus]
For more information call [340] 773-2868,
e-mail Menino [meninod@hotmail.com]
SOURCE: dead website  2003

Instructor: Ishaq Abdul-Kabir
